channel.title: How to make an instance
channel.description:
Hi.
What i want: I want for a quest, if the players have to kill the bosses that they come in a instanced place. (For every player a new instance).
Problem: How to do that

item.title: How to make an instance
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

You could go about it doing what was mentioned above, which is basically assigning a player height that is four times that of another player in the region and spawn jad on that height level.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make an instance
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“holylouis, post:5, topic:537775”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=656601.msg4393558#msg4393558 date=1388415348]
Do you know what an instance is?
[/quote]
isnt a instance where its like a players private sector type of thing for bosses and some quest like in new rs gwd is nothing but instances[/quote]
No…
He is asking what an instance is in java, not when it’s used in runescape (assuming that is how they do it).
hint http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/javaOO/classvars.html

Read full topic

item.title: How to make an instance
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

If I’m not mistaken, you can spawn a boss for each player individually when they click the door or something, that’d make it only work for that player alone. Or you can do as Dan said.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make an instance
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

You wouldn’t make an instance for this just because it is not worth the time putting into it. What i would do for a rsps is just keep multiplying the height level by 4.

Read full topic
